item.title: Gear Door Ground Control Switches/Lights – Gear Door Open/Door Arm Switches

numlitem.para: Inoperative switch is verified failed in open circuit position, and
Alternate gear extension switch ALTN GEAR EXTEND on flight deck is verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard appropriate switches as required and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: To verify Gear Door Open/Door Arm switches failed in the open circuit position, do the following:
One at a time, cycle the switches. If nothing happens, the switches are failed in the open circuit position.

warning.para: KEEP PERSONS AND EQUIPMENT AWAY FROM THE WHEEL WELL AREAS WHEN YOU MOVE THE ALTN GEAR EXTEND SWITCH TO OPEN THE GEAR DOOR(S). THE DOOR(S) OPEN AND CLOSE QUICKLY AND CAN CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO EQUIPMENT.

numlitem.para: Verify the ALTN GEAR EXTEND switch is operative as follows:

warning.para: KEEP PERSONS AND EQUIPMENT AWAY FROM THE WHEEL WELL AREAS WHEN YOU MOVE THE ALTN GEAR EXTEND SWITCH TO OPEN THE GEAR DOOR(S). THE DOOR(S) OPEN AND CLOSE QUICKLY AND CAN CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO EQUIPMENT.

numlitem.para: Move the ALTN GEAR EXTEND switch to the down position.
Return the aircraft to normal configuration.
